item.title: 汇市在美国通胀测试和美联储决议前保持稳定
item.description: 美元兑其他货币隔夜触及四周高点后，周三趋于稳定，市场参与者在等待美国的关键通胀数据和美联储当天晚些时候更新的利率预测。【原文：The dollar steadied on Wednesday after hitting a four-week high against peer currencies overnight as market players awaited key U.S. inflation data and the Federal Reserve's updated interest rate projections due later in the day.】

item.title: 数以千计的亚马逊 Flex 司机因被误划为承包商而提出仲裁申请
item.description: 数以千计的亚马逊 Flex 司机代表律师周二向路透社提交了仲裁申请，称他们被误划为独立承包商而非雇员。【原文：Thousands of Amazon.com Flex drivers filed arbitration claims on Tuesday, alleging they were misclassified as independent contractors rather than employees, the lawyer representing the drivers told Reuters.】

item.title: 油价因乐观的需求前景而上扬
item.description: 由于美国能源信息署和欧佩克（OPEC）对全球需求的乐观看法，周三油价走高。【原文：Oil prices ticked higher on Wednesday on upbeat global demand views from the U.S. Energy Information Administration and OPEC.】

item.title: 特斯拉股东起诉马斯克，要求返还数十亿美元非法所得
item.description: 一名机构股东在周二提起的诉讼中指控埃隆-马斯克利用内幕消息出售特斯拉股票，赚取了数十亿美元，要求法院指令特斯拉首席执行官归还 "非法利润"。【原文：Elon Musk made billions of dollars by selling Tesla stock using insider information, an institutional shareholder accused in a lawsuit filed on Tuesday, asking the court to direct the Tesla CEO to return "unlawful profits."】

item.title: 尽管金价接近历史最高水平，但淘金热仍笼罩亚洲
item.description: 业内官员表示，尽管黄金价格徘徊在5月份创下的历史高点附近，但亚洲对黄金的需求仍在激增，因为买家抢购黄金来对冲地缘政治和经济的不确定性。【原文：Demand for gold in Asia is surging despite prices hovering near the record highs it hit in May, industry officials say, as buyers snap up the metal to hedge against geopolitical and economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 在 "咆哮的凯蒂猫 "引发的零售交易狂潮中，GameStop 募集 21.4 亿美元资金
item.description: GameStop 周二表示，该公司已完成 "场内 "股票发行，募集资金总额约为 21.4 亿美元，此前几天，meme 股票影响者基思-吉尔（Keith Gill）进行了三年来的首次现场直播。【原文：GameStop said on Tuesday it had completed an "at-the-market" equity offering of its shares to raise roughly $2.14 billion in gross proceeds, days after meme stock influencer Keith Gill's first livestream in three years.】

item.title: 亿万富翁投资者 Ryan Cohen 击败 Bed Bath & Beyond 股东诉讼案
item.description: 本周二，亿万富翁激进投资者 Ryan Cohen 赢得了一项股东诉讼的撤诉，该诉讼指控他在 Bed Bath & Beyond 家居用品零售商濒临破产时，过快地从该公司股票中套现获利。【原文：The billionaire activist investor Ryan Cohen won the dismissal on Tuesday of a shareholder lawsuit accusing him of profitably cashing out of Bed Bath & Beyond shares too quickly as the home goods retailer was hurtling toward bankruptcy.】

item.title: 早间竞价：中国 CPI 先于美国 CPI 公布，美联储双重打击
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 谷歌将在巴西测试手机防盗人工智能功能
item.description: Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司周二表示，巴西将成为首个测试安卓手机防盗功能的国家，该功能可利用人工智能（AI）识别手机是否被盗并锁定设备屏幕。【原文：Alphabet's Google said on Tuesday that Brazil will be the first country to test an anti-theft feature for Android phones that uses artificial intelligence (AI) to identify when a phone has been stolen and lock the device's screen.】

item.title: Theranos 创始人伊丽莎白-霍尔姆斯寻求推翻欺诈定罪
item.description: Theranos 创始人伊丽莎白-霍姆斯（Elizabeth Holmes）和公司总裁拉梅什-"桑尼"-巴尔瓦尼（Ramesh "Sunny "Balwani）的律师周二敦促联邦上诉法院推翻对他们的定罪，因为他们在这家失败的血液检测初创公司中欺诈投资者，这家公司的估值曾高达 90 亿美元。【原文：Lawyers for Theranos founder Elizabeth Holmes and company President Ramesh "Sunny" Balwani on Tuesday urged a federal appeals court to overturn their convictions for defrauding investors in the failed blood testing startup, which was once valued at $9 billion.】

item.title: 埃森哲任命内部人士 Angie Park 为新任首席财务官
item.description: 埃森哲周二表示，目前领导企业与商业金融部门的 Angie Park 将于 12 月 1 日接替 KC McClure 担任公司首席财务官。【原文：Accenture said on Tuesday that Angie Park, currently leading its Business and Commercial Finance division, will take on the role of the company's CFO on Dec. 1, replacing KC McClure.】

item.title: 苹果公司如何利用谷歌的帮助训练人工智能模型
item.description: 本周一，苹果公司首席执行官蒂姆-库克（Tim Cook）在台上宣布与 OpenAI 达成了一项引人注目的协议，将其强大的人工智能模型作为语音助手 Siri 的一部分。【原文：On stage on Monday CEO Tim Cook's Apple announced a splashy deal with OpenAI to include its powerful artificial intelligence model as a part of its voice assistant, Siri.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克撤回对 OpenAI 的诉讼
item.description: 亿万富翁企业家埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周二向加利福尼亚州法院提起诉讼，指控 ChatGPT 制造商 OpenAI 及其首席执行官山姆-阿尔特曼（Sam Altman）放弃了这家初创公司最初的使命，即开发人工智能是为了造福人类而非盈利。【原文：Billionaire entrepreneur Elon Musk on Tuesday moved to dismiss his lawsuit in California state court accusing ChatGPT maker OpenAI and its CEO Sam Altman of abandoning the startup's original mission of developing artificial intelligence for the benefit of humanity and not for profit.】

item.title: 甲骨文季度营收不及预期
item.description: 甲骨文公司周二公布的第四季度营收不及华尔街预期，原因是在激烈的竞争和不确定的经济形势下，客户对其云服务的支出减少。【原文：Oracle missed Wall Street expectations for fourth-quarter revenue on Tuesday, hurt by weaker client spending on its cloud services amid stiff competition and an uncertain economy.】

item.title: 独家消息消息人士称联发科为微软人工智能笔记本电脑设计基于 Arm 的芯片
item.description: 据三位熟悉内情的人士透露，台湾芯片设计巨头联发科正在开发一款基于 Arm 的个人电脑芯片，该芯片将运行微软的 Windows 操作系统。【原文：Taiwanese chip design giant MediaTek is developing an Arm-based personal computer chip that will run Microsoft's Windows operating system, according to three people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，派拉蒙特别委员会召开会议，就 Skydance 交易进行表决
item.description: 据彭博新闻社援引两位熟悉此事的人士的话报道，派拉蒙全球公司董事会的一个特别委员会将于周二召开会议，就是否接受与大卫-埃里森（David Ellison）的 Skydance Media 合并的提议进行表决。【原文：A special committee of the board of Paramount Global is meeting on Tuesday to vote on whether to accept a proposal to merge with David Ellison's Skydance Media, Bloomberg News reported, citing two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: KKR 斥资 8.5 亿美元收购 Quick Quack 洗车店股份
item.description: 该投资公司周二告诉路透社，KKR & Co 已同意收购 Quick Quack Car Wash 的 "大量 "少数股权，熟悉该交易的消息人士称，KKR 将支付 8.5 亿美元。【原文：KKR & Co has agreed to buy a "significant" minority stake in Quick Quack Car Wash, the investment firm told Reuters on Tuesday and sources familiar with the deal said KKR would pay $850 million.】

item.title: 波音公司将在佛罗里达州新建工程设施
item.description: 波音公司周二表示，将在佛罗里达州为其国防和政府服务组合开设一个新的工程设施，并计划今年招聘近 200 个工程岗位。【原文：Boeing said on Tuesday it will open a new engineering facility in Florida for its defense and government services portfolios and aims to hire for nearly 200 engineering jobs this year.】

item.title: 又有四个州加入美国对苹果公司的垄断诉讼
item.description: 美国司法部在一份声明中说，周二又有四个州加入了司法部对苹果公司的诉讼，指控这家 iPhone 制造商垄断智能手机市场。【原文：Four more U.S. states on Tuesday joined the Justice Department's lawsuit against Apple Inc alleging the iPhone maker is monopolizing smartphone markets, the department said in a statement.】

item.title: 墨西哥将审查大众汽车工厂涉嫌侵犯劳工权利的行为
item.description: 墨西哥政府周二表示，墨西哥接受了美国提出的正式请求，对大众汽车墨西哥公司位于普埃布拉州的工厂涉嫌侵犯劳工权利的行为进行审查。【原文：Mexico accepted a formal request from the United States to review alleged labor rights violations at Volkswagen Mexico facilities in the state of Puebla, the government said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 纽约起诉强生公司
item.description: 法庭记录显示，纽约州总检察长周二对 Johnson & Johnson 提起诉讼，指控其违反了该州的行政法。【原文：New York's attorney general filed a lawsuit on Tuesday against Johnson & Johnson , alleging a violation of the state's executive law, court records show.】

item.title: 新的人工智能功能有望促进销售，苹果涨势喜人
item.description: 苹果公司周二股价攀升 6%，创下历史新高，此前一天，该公司发布了新的人工智能功能，旨在提高其设备（包括 iPhone）的吸引力。【原文：Apple shares climbed 6% to a record high on Tuesday, a day after unveiling new artificial intelligence features meant to increase the appeal of its devices, including the iPhone.】

item.title: 律师称，汽车制造商面临价值至少 76 亿美元的英国柴油门诉讼
item.description: 索赔人的律师周二在伦敦高等法院表示，全球最大的几家汽车制造商因涉嫌在排放测试中作弊而在英国面临着 150 万起诉讼，这可能会给他们造成至少 60 亿英镑（76 亿美元）的损失。【原文：Some of the world's biggest carmakers are facing 1.5 million lawsuits in Britain for allegedly cheating emissions tests that could cost them at least 6 billion pounds ($7.6 billion), claimants' lawyers told London's High Court on Tuesday.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：美国正在权衡对中国获取人工智能芯片的更多限制
item.description: 彭博新闻社周二援引知情人士的话报道称，拜登政府正在考虑进一步限制中国获得用于人工智能的芯片技术。【原文：The Biden administration is considering further restrictions on China's access to chip technology used for artificial intelligence, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 解说员：LVMH 集团和阿玛尼集团面临的法庭管理包括哪些内容？
item.description: 本周一，法国奢侈品巨头路威酩轩集团（LVMH）的意大利子公司迪奥制造有限公司（Dior Manufactures SRL）成为今年第三家被米兰法院接管的时装公司。【原文：An Italian subsidiary of French luxury giant LVMH , Dior Manufactures SRL, on Monday became the third fashion company to be put under administration by a Milan court this year.】

item.title: WeWork首席执行官托利将因公司退出破产程序而下台
item.description: WeWork 表示，首席执行官大卫-托利（David Tolley）将在周二晚些时候这家灵活工作空间提供商摆脱破产困境后卸任，公司将任命一位新的顶头上司。【原文：WeWork said CEO David Tolley would step down after the flexible workspace provider emerges from bankruptcy later on Tuesday and the company will name a new top boss.】

item.title: 波音飞机五月份交付量同比减少一半
item.description: 波音公司周二表示，5月份交付了24架商用飞机，约为去年同期交付给客户的50架飞机的一半，因为该公司继续放慢装配线的运行速度，以完成未完成的工作。【原文：Boeing said on Tuesday it delivered 24 commercial planes in May, about half of the 50 jets it handed over to customers during the same month a year earlier, as it continued operating a slower assembly line to complete outstanding work.】

item.title: 独家报道数据显示：巴拉圭大豆出口步伐加快，价格反弹
item.description: 路透社获得的装运数据显示，巴拉圭的大豆作物出口因今年年初河流水位低和价格疲软而受到延误，但随着全球需求增加和价值上升，农民加快了销售速度，出口势头正在增强。【原文：Paraguay's exports of its soybean crop, delayed by low river levels and weak prices earlier in the year, are gaining momentum, shipment data shared with Reuters show, as farmers speed up sales on stronger global demand and rosier values.】

item.title: 消息人士称，汉莎航空不太可能在 ITA 竞标中提供更多优惠
item.description: 三位直接了解此事的人士称，尽管欧盟反垄断监管机构正在审查汉莎航空竞购意大利国有航空公司 ITA 股份的事宜，但汉莎航空不太可能向这些机构提供更多的补救措施，尽管他们对长途航班表示担忧。【原文：Lufthansa is unlikely to offer more remedies to EU antitrust regulators scrutinising its bid for a stake in state-owned Italian carrier ITA despite their concerns about long-haul flights, three people with direct knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 世界银行董事会同意设立气候 "损失和损害 "基金
item.description: 世界银行董事会周二批准了一项计划，由该银行担任一个基金的临时东道主，为受气候变化影响的发展中国家提供财政支持。【原文：The World Bank's board approved a plan on Tuesday for the bank to act as interim host of a fund that will provide financial support to developing countries impacted by climate change.】
